attributes.action: apply for a contribution from the European Union Solidarity Fund
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Within three months of the devastating floods in central Europe in 2002, the European Commission had set up a Solidarity Fund to be used to restore vital infrastructure and equipment after natural disasters.
This fund has been used by Germany, Austria, Czech Rep, France,Italy, Spain,Estonia, Portugal,and elsewhere

Nowhere in the UK have ever received this funding before.

But apparently, no politician, Minister, MP, MEP or Councillor has ever bothered to apply for a  contribution from the fund.

Does this mean, they do not know about this Fund. 

We have all contributed taxes and this country gives a contribution to the European Union. Is it not time now to reclaim some of this funding to help our own population for once.
